name: PopoverPopup
description: Renders the popover content container with an arrow. Renders a <div> element.

props.name: className
props.description:
CSS class applied to the element, or a function that
returns a class based on the component’s state.

props.name: render
type: ComponentRenderFn<HTMLProps<any>, State> & ReactElement<Record<string, unknown>, string | JSXElementConstructor<any>>
props.description:
Allows you to replace the component’s HTML element
with a different tag, or compose it with another component.

Accepts a `ReactElement` or a function that returns the element to render.

props.name: initialFocus
props.description:
Determines the element to focus when the popover is opened.
By default, the first focusable element is focused.

props.name: finalFocus
props.description:
Determines the element to focus when the popover is closed.
By default, focus returns to the trigger.
